item.title: How do u make ppl admins/mods in megascape
item.dc:creator: @TwistedLogicOwner TwistedLogicOwner
item.description:
@TwistedLogicOwner wrote:

//start of moderator/admin list, 1 = mod, 2 = staff, 3 = admin
if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Admin”))
{
playerRights = 3;

if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Joel3431”))
{
playerRights = 1;
}}
if(playerId == -1) out.write(7); // “This world is full.”
else out.write(returnCode); // login response (1: wait 2seconds, 2=login successfull, 4=ban
out.write(playerRights); // mod level
out.write(0); // no log
//if(returnCode == 2 && !playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("_"))
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+" has logged in! There is now “+PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount() + " players.”;

	} catch(java.lang.Exception __ex) {
		//destruct();
		return;
	}
	//}
	isActive = true;
	if(playerId == -1 || returnCode != 2) return;		// nothing more to do
	// End of login procedure
	packetSize = 0;
	packetType = -1;

	readPtr = 0;
	writePtr = 0;

item.title: How do u make ppl admins/mods in megascape
item.dc:creator: @Devil_X Devil - X
item.description:
@Devil_X wrote:

Find this:
if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“YOURNAME”))
{
playerRights = 3;
}
then under this /\
|
|
else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“NAME OF PERSON”))
{
playerRights = 2;
}
or if silver Crown Do This
else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“NAME OF PERSON”))
{
playerRights = 1;
}

So For Example Do This

if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Name”))
{
playerRights = 3;
}
else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Name”))
{
playerRights = 2;
}
else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Name”))
{
playerRights = 1;
}

And Wallah Save And compile:)

item.title: How do u make ppl admins/mods in megascape
item.dc:creator: @Devil_X Devil - X
item.description:
@Devil_X wrote:

First off:.

  1. Search with CTRL + F.
  2. Enter Rights.
  3. U have to press F3 about 3 times or 4.
  4. U will see something like a name then under it rights;3.
  5. Change the name above to the person you want mod or admin.
  6. Save it.
  7. Click Compile.

Read full topic
